analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#334-366) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#357-360)
	-token.mint(bounty,bountyAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#360)
	-token.mint(team,teamAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#361)
	-token.mint(reserve,reserveAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#361-362)

Crowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#366-369) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,mintAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1818409ff612a6d574ca979904396bb4b8ea6d51.sol#368)
